mapper.select: SELECT guest_id guestId, guest_writter guestWriter, guest_content guestContent, guest_date guestDate FROM guest ORDER BY guest_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.update: UPDATE guest SET guest_content = #{guestContent}, guest_date = NOW() WHERE guest_id = #{guestId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO guest( guest_writter guest_content guest_date )VALUES( #{guestWriter}, #{guestContent}, NOW() )
